history: TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break time='1s' />.
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you public transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER Atwood public transit directions
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where do you want to go?For example, you can say I'm going to the airport
USER I'm going to pen and Negley.
TTS Okay, going to s negley avenue. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where do you wanna leave from?
USER your pizza
TTS Where would you like to leave from?
USER Center and Graham
TTS Okay, leaving from upmc center for care of infectious diseases. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you wanna travel?
USER now
TTS Okay, travelling at 12:23 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER no.
TTS <speak> Sounds good. <break strength='strong' /> Let me know if you didn't understand a step, and I'll repeat it for you. </speak>
TTS <speak> Just a minute. Let me look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 15 minutes, and you will take 1 bus. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
USER Yes.

TTS <speak><break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Take the <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 71D <break strength='weak'/> to </prosody> <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Fifth avenue at Negley avenue.</prosody> It will depart at <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 12:32pm. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
USER No, can you repeat it?
TTS Please tell me when it's ok to continue.
USER You can repeat it now.
TTS Please tell me when it's ok to continue.
USER Annie repeat instruction, please
TTS Please tell me when it's ok to continue.
USER Can you repeat Construction?
TTS Let me know when you're ready to continue.
USER Hey continue.
TTS <speak> The final step <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 2 mins to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> south Negley avenue. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I move onto the next step? </speak>
USER Yeah.
TTS <speak> </speak>
TTS <speak> Would you like to hear an alternate route?</speak>
USER Hello.

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> This is route 2 of 4, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 16 minutes, and you will take 1 bus. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Are you ready for the next step? </speak>
USER Yeah, go for it.

TTS <speak><break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Take the <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 75 <break strength='weak'/> to </prosody> <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Ellsworth avenue at Negley avenue.</prosody> It will depart at <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 12:39pm. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Are you ready for the next step? </speak>
USER now

TTS <speak><break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Take the <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 75 <break strength='weak'/> to </prosody> <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Ellsworth avenue at Negley avenue.</prosody> It will depart at <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 12:39pm. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I move onto the next step? </speak>
USER Yeah, yeah, I don't.
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> The final step <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 6 mins to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> south Negley avenue. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Are you ready for the next step? </speak>
USER Yeah, what's up?
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> </speak>
TTS <speak> Would you like to hear an alternate route?</speak>
USER No, I'm good.
TTS <speak> Were the provided directions useful? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Would you use GetGoing again? </speak>
USER at least once
TTS <speak> Would you use GetGoing again? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS Thank you for using CMU Get Going. If you would like to plan another trip, say <break strength='weak' /> RESTART.
